title: Montessori Mathematics - Concepts Development in Maths
headline: Learn how you can introduce exciting basic mathematical concepts to Montessori children in this free online course.
description: This brief course on Montessori mathematics is designed for teachers and parents looking for fun and innovative ways to introduce basic mathematical concepts to their children. It includes introducing numerals to children and helping them to recognize and write them using various Montessori materials. Moreover, you will also learn to teach them the four basic arithmetical operations using different sets of engaging and interactive activities.

courseDescription:
The field of mathematics has always exerted a significant influence on humankind. Our modern inventions could not have been possible without understanding the fundamental concepts of mathematics. Therefore, having a solid foundation in this subject is of utmost necessity to progress in this field. There is no better approach to building this foundation than the Montessori teaching method. Keeping this thought in mind, experts at Montessori Pro have developed this short yet exciting course.

Mathematics can be tiresome for many children. Therefore, this course aims to assist those Montessori teachers who keep looking for innovative and exciting methods to teach children basic mathematical concepts. Furthermore, by enrolling in this course, you will learn about the importance of sensory teaching in introducing mathematical concepts. Overall, the course comprises four topics. These teach you about the 'Three-Steps Lesson' activity that introduces numerals to children.

It also discusses exercises to help children match numerals with their corresponding amounts. The last topic explores the four basic arithmetical operations for Montessori children. We dedicate various exciting ways to teaching each arithmetical operation. The most attractive attribute is that we explain each exercise step-by-step with detailed graphics. This way, you will have no problem understanding these activities themselves. Why wait? Register today!
